_xResult.title: Open My Heart Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made velvet cocktail dress with hand sewn pearls
_xResult.longdesc:
This elegant black velvet dress features a classic cut and hand-sewn pearlsâ€”what else could you ask for? The back has a deep-v plunge and embellished cap sleeves which elevates the silhouette. The specialty cut and front and back folds of the skirt create great movement when you walk, plus there are hidden pockets where you can perfectly stow your red lipstick. Snag this made to measure number for a multitude of party occasions.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
